item.description:
• On the second Saturday of every month, Loving Hut Chandler (http://lovinghut.us/worcester) holds a $10 all-you-can-eat buffet fundraiser for VegWorcester. 10% is donated to VegWorcester to support local events and outreach.
  • This is an ( informal meetup) meaning that we won't necessarily be meeting up and all sitting together in formal meetup fashion, but you are invited to attend with friends and family between 12-5pm.
  • Leading up to and including the July 9th buffet, VegWorcester will be fundraising to help print and distribute a newly updated 'Guide to Vegetarian Dining in Worcester'. Never again should you wonder where to get good vegan falafal, asian cuisine or vegan pizza in our city! Along with places like Loving Hut, the Veg Dining Guide will include listings for every veg-food establishment in the area. We're hoping to have a donation jar at the buffet, but you can donate easily online at http://www.thepoint.com/campaigns/campaign-0-2856
  • More details about the fundraising at vegworcester.com!
  • There is also a Facebook event for this.
  • For more info:
  • manda@vegworcester.com
  • http://www.vegworcester.com    
  • http://www.facebook.com/vegworcester
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street, and come on in.
item.name: Loving Hut's July Vegan Buffet Fundraiser
